content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service?
Hi. I might need someone to look at my HVAC, it’s been acting up.
I’d be happy to help with that HVAC issue! May I have your name to get started with scheduling?
Actually, on second thought, I don't really want to continue. Please don’t contact me any more. Thanks.
reason: Customer asked not to be contacted further.
